resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

   I compared job running times. Looks there's no much difference.
   History build time varies from 9min to 15min, this job is about 14min.
   Given travis only provides 2 cores to a CI job, this change should be okay.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Possibly due to travis memory limit, though only {{-j4}}
https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/531277678#L1132
fields.summary: [CI][C++] Travis s390x CI job is failing and blocks endianness related code verification

comments.body: Thank you for creating an issue. Let us try to reduce -j at first.
From https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/reference/overview/, there are only 2 cores available. Guess we can set it to -j2.
Created a PR to reduce parallelism at https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10952. Let us see what will happen
